name: HeliVR Simulator
description:
Welcome to HeliVR Simulator, an immersive virtual reality helicopter flying simulation experience designed for both novice and experienced players.

• VR Cockpit with extreme realism and attention to detail
• All cockpit instruments function exactly as they would in real life.
• Experience realistic simulated aircraft behavior across various scenarios.
• Four carefully crafted worlds to explore, from small to large

HeliVR Simulator is developed by aviation enthusiasts who accepted the challenge of bringing the best VR experience to life for all kinds of players!
